description: This file defines a React Error Boundary component named ErrorBoundary, which catches runtime errors in its child components and provides a fallback UI, including error details and a reload button.

classes.name: ErrorBoundary
classes.description: A React component that catches JavaScript errors anywhere in its child component tree, logs error information, and displays a fallback UI.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes state; sets hasError to false.

methods.name: getDerivedStateFromError
methods.description: Updates state to indicate an error has been caught, enabling fallback rendering.

methods.name: componentDidCatch
methods.description: Logs error details to the console when an error is caught.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Displays fallback UI if an error has occurred; otherwise renders children.
